## Show people who you are

Build your own website with one of these free services:

- [Google Sites](https://sites.google.com/)
- [WordPress](https://wordpress.com/)
- [Wix](https://www.wix.com/)
- [Weebly](https://www.weebly.com/)

More control:

- [Netlify Drop](https://app.netlify.com/drop) (or the [full Netlify](https://www.netlify.com/))
- [GitHub Pages](https://pages.github.com/)
- Completely self-hosted
    - [DigitalOcean](https://www.digitalocean.com/)
    - [Installing the Apache Web Server on a DigitalOcean server](https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-install-the-apache-web-server-on-ubuntu-18-04)

Example pages:

- [Suparna Chaudhry](http://www.suparnachaudhry.com/) (Google Sites + custom domain name)
- [John Holbein](https://sites.google.com/site/johnbholbein/) (Google Sites + default domain name)
- [Devon Cantwell](https://www.devoncantwell.com/) (Squarespace)
- [Joannie Tremblay-Boire](http://joannieboire.weebly.com/) (Weebly)
- [Scott Cowley](http://www.scottcowley.com/) (WordPress)
- [Julia Silge](https://juliasilge.com/) (R Markdown + blogdown + [Hugo Academic](https://wowchemy.com/) + self-hosted)

Domain names:

- Best registrar I've found: [iwantmyname.com](https://iwantmyname.com/)
